title: Home, Family, Love - Res Lease in Austin. 3 Beds, 1 Baths
posting_body: Super cute FULLY FURNISHED & ALL BILLS PAID (minus cable) in walkable East Austin neighborhood (1.5 mile straight shot to UT Football Stadium) close to Mueller, the farmer's market, trails, parks, restaurants, HEB, Manor Road, 38th St Coffee, Bobo's Snackyard and entertainment!
This private & peaceful lot has a creek behind it and lots of room for an outdoor hang out!
The endearing neighborhood is warm and welcoming and would be a great place to call home.
Easy access to North Austin Tech companies, Downtown, Mueller, East Austin, Tesla.
The floodplain allows for limited development and does not allow a second unit.
Stay a while in the heart of this great town!
Do NOT reply to this ad, please call/text for a fast response.
Listed By: Christi Kendrick, Thrive Realty
